import org.apache.spark.sql.expressions.Window
import scala.math._
import scala.math.{log=>mathLog}

msg.data:

paragraphs.text:
val wordDf = normalisedDf
    .select(col("Review"))
    .withColumn("Review", split(trim(col("Review")), " "))
    .withColumn("ID", monotonically_increasing_id())
    .withColumn("Word", explode(col("Review")))

msg.data: wordDf: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Review: array<string>, ID: bigint ... 1 more field]

+--------------------+---+-----------+
|              Review| ID|       Word|

paragraphs.text:
val tf = wordDf
    .withColumn("Frequency", count(col("Review")).over(Window.partitionBy(col("ID"), col("Word"))))
    .distinct()
    .withColumn("TF", col("Frequency") / size(col("Review")))
    .select("Word", "ID", "TF")

msg.data: tf: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Word: string, ID: bigint ... 1 more field]

paragraphs.text:
val tfIdf = tf
    .join(idf, Seq("Word"), joinType="right")
    .na.drop()
    .withColumn("TFIDF", col("TF") * col("IDF"))
    .select("Word", "ID", "TFIDF")
    .orderBy(desc("TFIDF"))
    .limit(100)
